MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH32 and EH39 postcode areas of Longniddry and North Berwick. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and due to onsite delay's, we now expect your supply to be restored by 10pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:58pm on Monday, 29 March 2021.
